alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Lac Qui Parle (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 11:16PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lac qui Parle and northwestern Chippewa Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1116 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bellingham, or 9 miles southeast of Ortonville, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bellingham around 1125 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Milan. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 212 between mile markers 22 and 23. U.S. Highway 75 between mile markers 114 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
